update.description:
Various UI updates made based on testing and user study findings. 

- Made plot title editable

- updated scroll wheel zoom (zoom in/out at cursor point instead of center of plot)

- added box select zoom (middle mouse drag) 

- removed Play/Pause bottom panel

- added a splitter to make plot size adjustable 

- enabled dragging variable to empty space in plot to start plotting

- added Show Grid option to Settings menu

- set min y-axis auto scale limits

I can break it up to smaller PRs if it helps.

jenkins [homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/251/)
update.title: Plotting UI updates

content.raw:
nice! merged, f1d5dd0

thanks
content.html:
nice! merged, f1d5dd0

thanks

update.title: Plotting UI updates

content.raw: I think this is related to the issue above. The x range is always fixed.
content.html: I think this is related to the issue above. The x range is always fixed.

content.raw: About the splitter, in the future, it would be nice to have one between canvases as well.
content.html: About the splitter, in the future, it would be nice to have one between canvases as well.

content.raw: The box select zoom seems to be taking a different range from the one within the rectangle sometimes. I'm testing with the double pendulum, where the plot is a sinusoid. I clearly draw a rectangle including only one peak of the wave, but sometimes several peaks show up in the zoom. I can make a video if you want.
content.html: The box select zoom seems to be taking a different range from the one within the rectangle sometimes. I'm testing with the double pendulum, where the plot is a sinusoid. I clearly draw a rectangle including only one peak of the wave, but sometimes several peaks show up in the zoom. I can make a video if you want.

content.raw: Since we're removing the play/pause buttons in this PR, should we also forward space bar clicks to the main window so the simulation is paused when the plot window is focused?
content.html: Since we're removing the play/pause buttons in this PR, should we also forward space bar clicks to the main window so the simulation is paused when the plot window is focused?

content.raw: I pause the simulation and it stops plotting. Then I try dragging to see the beginning of the plot and when I release the mouse, the plot snaps back to the current moment. Is this expected?
content.html: I pause the simulation and it stops plotting. Then I try dragging to see the beginning of the plot and when I release the mouse, the plot snaps back to the current moment. Is this expected?

content.raw: done. 7559a9a
content.html: done. 7559a9a

content.raw: fixed. 7559a9a
content.html: fixed. 7559a9a

content.raw: does `QLabel` have `hover` state? I think I tried to do this in `style.qss` before and just gave up
content.html: does QLabel have hover state? I think I tried to do this in style.qss before and just gave up

content.raw: There are other instances below too
content.html: There are other instances below too

content.raw: wrong comment
content.html: wrong comment

content.raw: Maybe "Label text"?
content.html: Maybe "Label text"?

content.raw: If I understood it well, maybe we can use the `hover` state
content.html: If I understood it well, maybe we can use the hover state

content.raw: Should we move this to `style.qss` together with the material design stuff?
content.html: Should we move this to style.qss together with the material design stuff?
